column4: how come apt-get says I have latest version of python when the version is 2.51 ... lastest is 2.61? is it looking for laest v of 2.5x?
Ubuntu only does security updates, for newer programs you intall yourself, or wait for a later release
and you can get PPA's for a lot of stuff,  or   get a deb from a trusted source or  compile from tar.gz
